entries.context: A natural language name identifying the code system. This name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such as code generation.

The name of the organization or individual responsible for the release and ongoing maintenance of the code system.
The name of an individual to contact.
A free text natural language description of the code system from a consumer's perspective.
